page.title: 10 COMPANIES OF RAINFORD
page.content: The rest of the main companies in Rainford are : Bi-Line Custom Built Cabinetry;Pumps and Piping,who specialize in plumbing for greenhouses and market gardening centres;Winstan- ley's Building Contractors;Swift Top High Technology Gas Products,who construct and sell gas fires and barbeques-they have only been in the area since the beginning of June 1985; Abbey Tyres-car repairers;West Lancs. Windows;Coys,who specialize in international freight;and Tern Boat and Trailer Company,who construct fibreglass boats to sell locally and are an uncharacteristic company of this area.
